attributes.action: Make the EMA grant available to all students regardless of household income.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The EMA grant is only available to students whose household income falls below 3,800GBP. If students elected not to continue their education but to get jobseekers allowance, then this would put a greater strain on the economy than rewarding ALL students to carry on with their education. So why not make this available to ALL students?
